dcterms:creator: Valerio Basile
Cristina Bosco
Elisabetta Fersini
Debora Nozza
Viviana Patti
Francisco Rangel
Paolo Rosso
Manuela Sanguinetti
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of collected messages from Twitter in English and Spanish, specifically aimed at detecting hate speech towards immigrants and women. The dataset contains 10,000 English messages with 42.1% labeled as hate speech and 4,969 Spanish messages with 41.5% labeled as hate speech.
dcterms:title: Twitter Hate Speech Dataset (English and Spanish)

dcterms:creator: Alexis Conneau
Guillaume Lample
Marc’Aurelio Ranzato
Ludovic Denoyer
Hervé Jégou
dcterms:description: MUSE embeddings are multilingual embeddings based on fastText, allowing words with similar meanings across languages to have similar vector representations.
dcterms:title: MUSE Embeddings

dcterms:creator: Matthew E. Peters
Mark Neumann
Mohit Iyyer
Matt Gardner
Christopher Clark
Kenton Lee
Luke Zettlemoyer
dcterms:description: ELMo provides deep contextualized word representations based on the output of a three-layer pre-trained neural network, capturing the context in which words are used.
dcterms:title: ELMo Embeddings

dcterms:creator: Chikashi Nobata
Joel Tetreault
Achint Thomas
Yashar Mehdad
Yi Chang
dcterms:description: A dataset focused on abusive language detection in online user content, providing insights into the challenges of identifying abusive language.
dcterms:title: Additional Hate Speech Datasets

dcterms:creator: Anna Schmidt
Michael Wiegand
dcterms:description: A survey on hate speech detection using natural language processing, discussing various datasets and methodologies in the field.
dcterms:title: Other Hate Speech Datasets
